Text:
A norweigan translation? Hmm, might be worth it. Naw, just kidding. The swedish translation of Pondus is by far the best (funniest) comic I've ever read. Nothing comes close, not even Garfield O.o

Wonder if it makes sense to me in Norweigan though =)

tackar för denna
har länge letat efter pondus
allt brukar dessutom vara bättre på sitt originalspråk

hehe:-P Frode Øverli must be the BEST comic-writer in the world! Beats them ALL!

Hope you enjoy! :-)
Beklager at det går så treigt, er dere litt tolmodige blir det ferdig til slutt:-)
Jeg hadde elsket om den ble seedet :-) Takk for genial torrent! Elsker Pondus !
